amendment.description: Amendment provides an increase of $2.5 million (by offset) for the National Criminal History Improvement Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 41 printed in the Congressional Record to redirect $2,500,000 from the "Department of Justice- General Administration- Salaries and Expenses" to the "National Criminal History Improvement Program -State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boswell amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 422 - 2 (Roll no. 355).

action.text: Mr. Westmoreland demanded a separate vote on the Boswell amendment (A005).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boswell amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 416 - 1 (Roll no. 392).
